German-based Torsten Hoffmann is an expert at international video/TV distribution with a large.

Torsten has a BA in international Business and an MBA from the University of Oxford (Sept.2010). He has been working in the media industry for 12 years, with focus on marketing and sales roles. Torsten spent five years working for one of EuropeÂ´s largest cable operators. As a Partner at Global Media Consult (GMC) he represents 35 international TV channels on a global level and leveraging his contacts at hundreds of cable, IPTV, satellite, and mobile operators through a network of agents and partner companies. His clients include top international TV brands from the USA, Europe, Korea, Katar, Russia, India and he also represents a number of specialized smaller niche payTV channels. GMC also develops new TV channels and cross-media platforms. Torsten is a member of Christ Church College, Mensa International and passionate about the environment. He has travelled to 50 countries, is a early adopter for web 2.0 technologies and an active LinkedIn user with a very large professional network.
